name: Thru The Lens
description:
A world where everything is always beautiful... or is it?

This is a click and point adventure, featuring voice acting, original music, and gorgeous art. Can you solve the mystery and obtain the real ending? (there are 4 possible endings, depends on number of jewels collected!)

*Spoilers Story Dialogue From The Game****

Intro Scene:

"Dear Granddaughter, Look thru the lens to unmask the truth of this world. Come to my mansion to help prevent the blindness that plagues this society".

Letter 1:

" Dr. Fredricks, I can't believe we have been living a life like this, forced to make everyone follow suit like a rat in a cage, only seeing what we want them too. I know the condition our world is in... it's just.. I'm sorry..."

Letter 2: 

"Dr. Lumberg, the tests with the virtue stone have proven successful, It puts everyone into a euphoric state. They have no idea what their surroundings are like, now we just need to be able to spread this to everyone in the world. I just know we won't last long with out this...."

Letter 3:

"The misdeeds of us all, what have we done? This stone, it only caused a blindness to what is really going on. We ignored our problems instead of fixing them... I just wish I had a little more time, maybe, just maybe..."
